projects.title: Macroeconomic Forecasting with Deep Learning
projects.description: Developed hybrid CNN-LSTM and GRU-LSTM architectures for multi-step GDP forecasting using 26 years of Indonesian macroeconomic data (1997-2023).
achievements: Achieved 9.83 RMSE through systematic hyperparameter optimization
Cross-model benchmarking against traditional statistical methods

projects.title: Quantitative Stock Analysis & Prediction System
projects.description: Built end-to-end pipeline for all IDX-listed stocks: data collection, technical indicator computation (RSI, MACD, EMA, ATR), and ML-based price prediction.
achievements: Implemented ensemble models (Random Forest, XGBoost, LSTM)
Built backtesting framework for strategy validation

projects.title: SignGuard: Federated Learning Defense System
projects.description: Developing novel defense mechanism combining ECDSA cryptographic signatures with reputation-based systems to detect poisoning attacks in federated learning. Targeting cross-bank fraud detection scenarios with privacy-preserving model aggregation.
achievements: Targeting cross-bank fraud detection with privacy preservation
Research in progress for academic publication
